title: IDN Punycode Converter
description: Convert between Unicode domain names and Punycode (ASCII-compatible encoding)

conversion.unicodeTooltip: Enter the domain name you want to convert
conversion.unicodeHelp: Enter Unicode domain names with international characters

conversion.placeholder: Enter a domain name to see the conversion result

warnings.title: Notices
warnings.asciiOnly: Input contains only ASCII characters - no conversion needed

info.aboutDescription: Internationalized Domain Names (IDN) allow domain names to contain Unicode characters from various scripts and languages. Punycode is the ASCII-compatible encoding that represents Unicode domain labels, allowing non-ASCII domain names to work with existing DNS infrastructure.
info.howItWorksDescription: Each Unicode label is encoded separately:
info.xnPrefix: The xn-- prefix identifies punycode labels

security.homograph: Homograph attacks: visually similar characters from different scripts
security.validate: Always validate and normalize IDN input in applications
security.browserPolicy: Be aware of browser IDN display policies
